name: 3 Tuesdays at Spooky Pizza Place
description:
You got into a car crash on Some Guy's car and you don't have enough money to pay for the damages. So you have to spend 3 Tuesdays at his very own, Spooky Pizza Place. But be warned as super-duper scary robots (I think) roam the halls. Will you survive 3 Tuesdays?

CREDITS

ObscuritySTA - Voice Actor for Jake from State Farm

Jon Morton - Voice actor of Yug

CSVoiceActing - Voice actor of Steve The Robber

Kärelia - Modeler of Yug
